title: LF Support/Jungle/Top Silver 5+
body:
I am currently looking for a Support, Jungle and Top for ranked 5s and online tournaments.

Please apply with this format;
IRL Name:
Age:
Ingame name:
What rank are you?:
What role are you applying for?:
Which champions will you play?:
What days are you available on Wednesdays and Sundays?:
Are you willing to use Teamspeak?:
Are you willing to compete in online tournaments?

Thanks,
Lucky

replies.body:
IRL Name: Thomas 
Age: 14 (don't judge me) 
Ingame name: White HD 
Rank: Silver 5 
Role: Top/Jungle 
Champs: I play heavy tank and CC champs as i perceive them as teamfight changing champions. However i can play champions more damage based if the teams strats need it. But overall i have a big champion pool. 
I will be available most of the time. 
Teamspeak is fine
Online tournaments are fine.
